article: One day a famous actor had just got into the train with all his luggage when a young man came and _ down in the seat opposite him. The young man took out a _ and began to read it, _ the actor tried to get some _ in his corner of the carriage. When he opened his eyes, he _ that the young man was looking at him with his _ open, his book forgotten. The actor shut his eyes and tried to sleep again, _ every time he opened them, the young man was looking at him with the same excited look .At last, he gave up the attempt to sleep, took out a newspaper, put it _ in front of him and began to read. The young man tried several times to get into conversation with the actor, but _ . After a long period of silence the young man said again, "I'm George P. Anderson of Willington, Vermont." This time the actor put his _ down and said, "So am I." That was the end of the conversation.
